banner.title: Healthcare From Anywhere
banner.description: Our AI powered telemedical application lets you talk to a doctor from anywhere using our highly secure end-to-end encrypted video call

joinus.title: Join Us Today
joinus.description: Here are three simple and quick steps to becoming a member of the E-Medic family.

steps.step1: Register on the website by providing necessary information.
steps.step2: Click on the link sent to your email to verify your account.
steps.step3: Log in to your account to enjoy our amazing services!

steps.title: Sign Up
steps.content: Join the future of healthcare by signing up online

steps.title: Consult a Doctor
steps.content: Connect with a qualified doctor virtually, sharing your health concerns and symptoms for expert guidance.

steps.title: Get a Doctor's Medical Report
steps.content: Receive your tailored medical report electronically into your inbox.

steps.title: Order Your Medication
steps.content: With a click, order your prescribed medication and have it delivered right to your doorstep.

partnership.title: We Value Your Partnership.
partnership.content: Doctors, pharmacies, and corporate and private investors are welcome to partner with our team of world-class professionals.

pricing.title: Choose a plan that works well for you.
pricing.description: Select a pricing plan that aligns perfectly with your needs and budget, ensuring you get the best value for your healthcare journey.

packages.name: Starter Plan
packages.description: Access to all general practitioners monthly.

packages.name: Advanced Plan
packages.description: Access to cardiologists and other specialist doctors monthly.

packages.name: Premium Plan
packages.description: Full access for all members of your HMO.

testimonialDetails.text: I cannot thank eMedic enough for their prompt and reliable services. It is a game-changer for busy individuals like me!
We partnered with eMedic to provide our team with access to valuable health resources. Thank you, eMedic, for helping us prioritize health at work.
As retirees, staying healthy is our top priority. eMedic truly understands the needs of older adults.
Their website is user-friendly, and the option to chat with medical professionals online gave me peace of mind. Thank you, eMedic!
As a busy mom, eMedic has made it so much easier to manage our healthcare needs.

footer.address: 3/6 Alh. Adejumo St. Ilupeju, Lagos, Nigeria
